Description: Performs physical labor on construction sites, including digging, carrying materials, operating basic tools, and site cleanup.
Constructs, installs, and repairs structures and fixtures made of wood, plywood, and wallboard, using hand and power tools.
Installs, maintains, and repairs electrical systems and equipment, ensuring that work is in accordance with relevant codes.
Installs and repairs pipes and fixtures for water, gas, drainage, and sewage systems.
Operates machinery such as bulldozers, excavators, cranes, and graders to move earth and materials for construction projects.
Assembles products or components on a production line, operates machinery, and ensures quality control.
Joins metal parts by heating and fusing them, using various welding techniques and equipment.
Sets up and operates machine tools to produce precision metal parts, instruments, and tools.
Inspects manufactured products to ensure they meet company standards and specifications.
Loads, unloads, and moves materials within a warehouse, often using forklifts or other equipment. May also be involved in inventory management.
Operates trucks to transport goods and materials over short or long distances, adhering to traffic laws and schedules.
Delivers goods, documents, or food items to various locations using a motorcycle or van.
Operates buses to transport passengers on designated routes, ensuring safety and punctuality.
Transports passengers to their desired destinations using a taxi or personal vehicle through a ride-sharing platform.
Assists with the coordination and movement of goods, possibly involving dispatching drivers, tracking shipments, and maintaining records.
Performs routine maintenance and repairs on buildings, equipment, and machinery, including plumbing, electrical, and carpentry tasks.
Inspects, repairs, and maintains vehicles, diagnosing mechanical and electrical problems.
Installs, maintains, and repairs heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.
Cleans and maintains the interior and exterior of buildings, ensuring a clean and safe environment.
Maintains lawns, gardens, and other outdoor areas, performing tasks such as mowing, planting, and trimming.
Performs various tasks on a farm, including planting, cultivating, harvesting crops, and caring for livestock.
Provides technical support in farming operations, possibly involving soil testing, pest control, and equipment maintenance.
Maintains and repairs farm machinery and equipment to ensure efficient operation.
Cares for farm animals, including feeding, watering, and ensuring their health and well-being.
Involved in the cultivation and harvesting of specific crops on a large scale, such as fruits, vegetables, or sugarcane.
